backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, community posts, marketplace listings, subscriptions, and buyer intents with stable IDs and permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing GA tracking integration and CSP updates with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files for quick reference in build planning.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Defines asset caching and CSP headers allowing Google Analytics resources and configuring MIME types for the deployed frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light/dark theme tokens and global layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint including the Google Analytics gtag.js snippet and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing global app state, authentication, plan selection, demo mode, scrolling, and premium designer modal.
frontend/src/components/AuthControls.tsx: Authentication UI enabling Internet Identity login/logout with status display and forwarded ref support.
frontend/src/components/DeployDiagnostic: Shows a development-only alert listing missing canister IDs or failed backend actor initialization, with dismiss support.
frontend/src/components/PlanStatus.tsx: Displays the user's current plan as a styled badge with an icon.
frontend/src/components/Reveal.tsx: Animates children when they scroll into view, respecting reduced-motion settings and optional delay.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/canvasE: Generates and downloads canvas-based birthday card images using templates or premium designer settings.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/loadCar: Loads an image with CORS enabled and returns it as an HTMLImageElement.
frontend/src/features/cardExport/textWra: Wraps text into canvas-renderable lines based on a max width, capped at 12 lines.
frontend/src/features/community/componen: Renders a community post preview with metadata, follow actions, and a view-details button.
Shows detailed post info in a dialog, with creator info and follow controls.
Provides a form dialog for authenticated users to create community posts with title, type, and description.
frontend/src/features/community/hooks/us: Fetches all community posts or a single post using React Query and the backend actor.
Mutation hook for creating community posts, with cache invalidation and error toasts.
Manages followed creators using localStorage, provides hooks to follow creators and check follow state with backend sync and toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/examples/sampleWis: Defines a SampleWish interface and exports several predefined birthday wish examples.
frontend/src/features/generator/constant: Exports fixed lists of relationships, tones, languages, and personalities for the birthday generator.
frontend/src/features/generator/format.t: Formats a BirthdayPack into a single display string with sections like main wish and captions.
frontend/src/features/generator/generate: Generates a BirthdayPack by assembling text from language phrases, tone rules, and user inputs.
frontend/src/features/generator/language: Provides language-specific phrase sets and selects the correct pack based on chosen language.
frontend/src/features/generator/randomiz: Generates randomized form data for the birthday generator using preset sample values.
frontend/src/features/generator/types.ts: Defines TypeScript types for generator inputs, enums, and the BirthdayPack structure.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/compon: UI dialog for creating a marketplace listing with form fields, validation, and mutation handling.
Displays a marketplace listing card with metadata, price, creator info, and a buy request dialog.
A dialog UI allowing users to contact sellers, preview a prefilled message, copy/share it, and optionally record interest via a mutation.
frontend/src/features/marketplace/hooks/: React Query mutation hook for creating marketplace listings and handling success/error toasts and cache invalidation.
Mutation hook that sends a buyerâ€™s interest message to a listing and displays success or error notifications.
Query hooks to fetch all marketplace listings or a specific listing from the backend actor.
frontend/src/features/premiumCardDesigne: Displays cards for upcoming premium features with icons, titles, and descriptions.
UI panel letting users customize card design options such as background, typography, colors, alignment, and uploaded photos.
Export and share actions for premium cards, including downloads, clipboard copy, WhatsApp sharing, and Web Share API integration.
Main module managing theme selection and the card designer interface, integrating preview, customization, and export components.
Renders a premium card preview using theme settings, animations, decorations, and optional photo placement.
Defines preset premium card themes and a helper to fetch a theme by ID.
Type definitions for premium themes and designer state configuration.
React hook managing premium card designer state and update functions.
frontend/src/features/templates/applyTem: Returns Tailwind class strings for a template ID, combining base and template-specific styles.
frontend/src/features/templates/backgrou: Maps template image keys to static asset paths and provides a lookup helper.
frontend/src/features/templates/template: Declares available card templates with metadata, colors, and background image paths.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInView.ts: IntersectionObserver-based hook that reports when an element enters the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/usePlanSelection.ts: Maintains a user plan selection persisted in localStorage and scoped by principal.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects system reduced-motion preference and updates on media query changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoAmI.ts: React Query hook that verifies user authentication by calling the backend and returns the user's principal or null.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, layout classes, and custom neon utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility function to copy text to the clipboard with a fallback for older browsers.
frontend/src/lib/datetime.ts: Provides helpers to format timestamps into relative time strings and readable dates.
frontend/src/lib/principal.ts: Shortens a principal string for UI display by keeping only its beginning and end.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp share link with encoded text.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity provider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/sections/CommunitySection.t: Renders the community posts section with filtering, authentication checks, and dialogs for viewing and creating posts.
frontend/src/sections/ExamplesSection.ts: Displays sample wishes with a tone filter and animated card layout.
frontend/src/sections/FaqSection.tsx: Shows an FAQ list using accordion components with reveal animations.
frontend/src/sections/FooterSection.tsx: Footer displaying app info, quick links, and a branded credit section.
frontend/src/sections/GeneratorSection.t: Renders the birthday pack generator UI with form handling, validation, and actions to generate, randomize, copy, and share results.
frontend/src/sections/HeroSection.tsx: Displays the landing hero area with branding, prompts, authentication controls, and buttons to start generating or explore demos.
frontend/src/sections/LegalSections.tsx: Shows static Privacy Policy and Terms of Service sections using card layouts with localized update dates.
frontend/src/sections/MarketplaceSection: Implements the marketplace view with listing retrieval, filtering, search, and a dialog to create new listings.
frontend/src/sections/OutputSection.tsx: Displays generated birthday outputs with options to copy, share, and download card images depending on user permissions.
frontend/src/sections/PricingSection.tsx: Renders pricing cards for Free and Pro plans with feature lists and selection logic using app context.
frontend/src/sections/TemplatesSection.t: Displays selectable card templates and shows a preview of the generated birthday card based on user inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, store, retrieve, and clear URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors, shadows, animations, and content scanning paths.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Sets up Vite with React, env var plugins, aliasing, build settings, dev server proxy, and dependency optimization.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, goals, architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for the WishMint AI app.
